settings.title: Accelerate Weight Loss
settings.text: Unlock rapid weight loss with our Detox Tea, expertly crafted to boost your metabolism, reduce bloating, and enhance digestion. Experience a natural, refreshing way to achieve your fitness goals and feel your best every day!

settings.title: Enhanced Cardio & Oxygen Uptake
settings.text: This unique formulation helps increase blood flow, delivering more oxygen to your muscles, which improves endurance and overall stamina. Elevate your workouts and feel invigorated with every sip!

settings.title: Protects & Grows Muscle Cells
settings.text: Infused with powerful antioxidants and essential nutrients, this blend helps reduce inflammation, repair muscle damage, and promote the growth of new muscle cells. Enhance your strength and recovery with every refreshing sip!

settings.title: TRIPLE THREAT
settings.paragraph_one: Our 14-Day Detox Slimming Tea, Herbal Detox and Cleanse Dietary Supplement, and Fat Burning Supplement work together to transform your health and fitness. They flush out toxins, boost metabolism, and improve digestive health, making weight loss more effective and sustainable. These supplements also enhance your body's natural fat-burning capabilities while providing essential nutrients for overall well-being. In just two weeks, you can feel rejuvenated, energized, and lighter!
settings.paragraph_two: Our 14-Day Detox Slimming Tea, Herbal Detox and Cleanse Dietary Supplement, and Fat Burning Supplement work by combining powerful natural ingredients that support your body's detoxification processes. The detox tea flushes out toxins and reduces bloating, while the herbal detox supplement cleanses your digestive system and improves gut health. The fat-burning supplement boosts your metabolism, helping your body burn fat more efficiently. Together, they enhance nutrient absorption, increase energy levels, and support sustainable weight loss, leaving you feeling rejuvenated and lighter.

settings.title: NIGHT CLEANSE
settings.paragraph_one: Whether your goal is to lose weight or increase the intensity of your exercise, the SKINNY product line can be beneficial in more ways than one. settings.text:
To maximize your results:

Do take a rest in between 14 - day cycles
Don’t take it continously

This Detox is a 14-day program and not intended for long term use. Take a 4 to 6-week break in between 14 day programs for your body to rest and readjust after each detox.


Do eat your meals regularly
Don’t starve yourself

This Detox is not a diet or meal replacement. To maximize the effects of your detox, we recommend eating meals with lots of fruits and greens, lean meat and whole grains.

Don’t Detox if you’re pregnant
The benefits of your tea come into play during periods when you’re most likely to have food cravings, cramps or bloating.

settings.title: How long will it take to see results?
settings.answer: Many users start to notice positive changes within the first week, with more significant results typically visible by the end of the 14-day program. Consistency and adherence to the recommended usage instructions are key to achieving the best outcomes.

settings.title: Can I take this while I’m breastfeeding?
settings.answer:
No we do not recommend.

It's important to consult with your healthcare provider before starting any detox or supplement regimen while breastfeeding. They can provide personalized advice based on your specific health needs.

settings.title: Can I detox while I’m pregnant?
settings.answer: Detoxing while pregnant is generally not recommended. Always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any detox or supplement program during pregnancy to ensure safety for you and your baby.

settings.title: Is there caffeine in this?
settings.answer: No, our detox products do not contain caffeine, as they use green coffee extract which is naturally low in caffeine. This allows you to enjoy the benefits without the jittery side effects.

settings.title: Can I take all three products together?
settings.answer: Yes, you can take all three products together for optimal results. Take the fat-burning coffee in the morning (7-10 ounces, hot or cold), the pills throughout the day (2 in the morning, 2 with dinner), and the detox tea at night before bed (7-10 ounces, hot or cold).

settings.title: Are the pills big?
settings.answer: No, the pills are small and easy to swallow. If you prefer, they can also be crushed up and mixed with food or a beverage for easier consumption.
